description: IndigenousServicesCanada has therequirement for the supply, delivery and installation of onex-ray AmbientExperience System .
full_summary:
### Tender Announcement
#### I. Background

Indigenous Services Canada has issued a solicitation for the supply, delivery, and installation of one X-ray Ambient Experience System, along with any required supplemental items for the Norway House Hospital in Manitoba.

#### II. Description

The X-ray Ambient Experience System is a medical diagnostic equipment that combines X-ray imaging with ambient technology to provide a more comfortable experience for patients. The successful bidder will be responsible for providing, delivering, and installing the system, as well as ensuring all necessary documentation and testing is completed.

#### III. Tender Information
### Solicitation Number
* Solicitation Number: WS3908478702
* Amendment Number: 1
* Publication Date: 2023-10-16

### Tender Closing Date
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-11-09T14:00:00 (EST)

### Expected Contract Start and End Dates
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2024-01-22
* Expected Contract End Date: None

### Status
* Tender Status: Expired

### UNSPSC Code
* UNSPSC Code: *42201800
* UNSPSC Description: *Medical Diagnostic X-Ray Products*

### Procurement Category and Method
* Procurement Category: GD
* Procurement Method: Competitive – Open Bidding

### Selection Criteria
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price

### Trade Agreements
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Contract Award
* The contract will be awarded to the lowest bidder.

### Contact Information
* Department of Indigenous Services (ISC)
* 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

* Tanya Gostev, Contracting Authority
	+ Email: [tanya.gostev@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:tanya.gostev@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Notice URL
* https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17730626?extsite=MTc3MzA2MjZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
